comments.body:
Wouldn't hurt to add unit tests for util.get_file_lines() now.

There are several unit tests that mock out get_file_content so it is easy to mock. Although testing get_file_lines() with a mocked get_file_content doesnt test much of get_file_lines, easy enough test to add.

(get_file_content could use tests as well, though get_file_content is a little more finicky. get_file_content tests do not need  to be part of this pr though...)
Can I do this in a separate PR? I'd like to get this one merged since it's a pretty important fix.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@

def get_file_lines(path, strip=True):
    '''get list of lines from file'''
    data = get_file_content(path, strip=strip)
